name: Junkyard Simulator
description:
Grab a hammer and crush metal! Take ownership of the junkyard and expand it to the limits. You will start with nothing but a hammer, but you will end up as owner of the biggest junkyard in the area!
During the game you will have full freedom in how you want to get rich.
You can collect scrap from the ground, or invest your money in huge machines that can help you with crushing tons of scrap a day.
Buy vehicles, deal with dcrap dealers, segregate and make that money!
In Junkyard Simulator you play as owner of scrap yard, which with his own hands is trying to create the largest junkyard in the area.
The way you do it depends on your decision! Do you want to manually search and collect the best scrap? No trouble!
Maybe you want to buy a vehicle that will allow you to collect More scrap at once?
Of course! Or maybe you prefer pure destruction without comminution to piecies?
That's the point! Buy a big shredder and crush everything that just caught your eye!
Various machines will help you in achieving a scrap monopol, such as:
- Cranes
- Loaders
- Crushers
- Choppers
- Electromagnets/Hydraulic cranes
- Trolleys
- Trailers
As owner you must remeber that:
- By segregating scrap you earn more!
- The better way to enrich you find the better.
- Machines simplify work, but do not segregate scrap.
- Maintaining a running junkyard costs, so do not hesitate!
